publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1108# Brian Adam: North East Regional Sports Facilities-That the Parliament regrets the absence of high standard indoor and outdoor sports facilities in the north east; supports the joint bid from Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire councils with Aberdeen and Robert Gordon universities, other public sector partners and a wide range of sporting clubs and bodies; encourages sportscotland and the Scottish Executive to look favourably on this application, and wishes the partners well in progressing the bid.

S2M-1108# Brian Adam: North East Regional Sports Facilities-That the Parliament regrets the absence of high standard indoor and outdoor sports facilities in the north east; supports the joint bid from Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire councils with Aberdeen and Robert Gordon universities, other public sector partners and a wide range of sporting clubs and bodies; encourages sportscotland and the Scottish Executive to look favourably on this application, and wishes the partners well in progressing the bid. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Rob Gibson*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Fergus Ewing*, Alex Johnstone*, Richard Lochhead*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Shiona Baird*, Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*, Bruce Crawford*, Jim Mather*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1108# North East Regional Sports Facilities (lodged on 25 March 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mike Pringle*
